entry.title: Hello.
entry.content:
My name is Akhil and I am a software engineer who wields his powers to make stuff move in the physical domain.

A little bit about myself: over the past nine years, I have worked as a software engineer in the IoT sector. Most recently, I worked as a Robotics Software Engineer with OpenShelf, testing a variety of sensor integrations and developing an AWS hosted MQTTS bidirectional telemetry pipeline physical robot. I am currently a graduate student at Rutgers University, pursuing my MS in Electrical and Computer Engineering, specializing in robotic systems and control.

As a side quest, I’m interested in how physical phenomena can be rendered and simulated through software. I am currently working on a simple 2D game physics engine (courtesy of the fantastic Pikuma course on the subject). If you’re interested, you can check out this project and some other ones on this site.


Also I love making new friends! Feel free to ping me if you ever feel like a coffee and a chat :)
